home.welcomedesc: Welcome to SafeHaven, your refuge in times of uncertainty. Whether you've traveled far or near, your journey to safety is our priority. Here, you'll find a supportive community, resources to rebuild, and opportunities to thrive. Together, we'll navigate this new chapter with compassion and resilience. Welcome home to SafeHaven.
home.accessServices: Login or sign up to access our services! Chat with our administrator or other fellow refugees. You can also send queries for any help you need!
home.applyRefugeeStatus: How do I apply for refugee status?
home.applyRefugeeInstructions: You can apply for refugee status by filing a Form I-589, Application for Asylum and for Withholding of Removal, with the appropriate agency.
home.refugeeBenefits: What benefits are available to refugees?
home.benefitsDescription: Refugees may be eligible for various benefits including medical assistance, financial aid, and housing support depending on the country they are in.
home.statusProcessDuration: How long does the refugee status determination process take?
home.processTimeframe: The duration can vary widely depending on the country and specific circumstances, but it generally takes several months to a few years.
home.findLegalHelp: Where can I find legal assistance?
home.legalHelpSources: Legal assistance for refugees may be available through local NGOs, legal aid societies, or via referrals from the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR).
home.educationalPrograms: Are there educational programs available for refugees?
home.educationDetails: Many countries offer specific educational programs for refugees, often including language classes, integration courses, and sometimes access to higher education.
home.employmentOptions: Refugees can often find employment through job placement services, refugee-specific job fairs, or local employment agencies that collaborate with refugee assistance programs.

about.description: Our portal enables care for refugees from 100+ nations. Browse our camps, join in the discussions and we will provide care for all.
about.aboutsafehavendesc: We have more than 10k refugees registered on our website for refugee assistance.
about.desc: Safe haven was founded in 2001 and has been still working and helping lakhs of refugees. This is a secure and safe place to ask help. We are here to provide what you need.
about.fillupquery: Fill up a query form and we will be answer any questions you have.
about.morecampsus: More camps coming across 10 more states in the US.
about.camplocations: We have camps across Boston, New York and California.
